column2: I have prepared a cermony with sacrifice dedicated to [This.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] with intention to curse [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].
Using my knowledge of curses and dark magics I have prepared ritual to curse [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].
The witch [Root.job_mage.GetTitledFirstName] has prepared a ritual to curse [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].
Under your lieges orders you prepared a ritual to curse [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].
After borrowing knowledge from many books and legends I prepared a ritual. Yet after a few hours of trying to succesfully curse [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName], I don't think I succeeded.
Under your orders your court magician [Root.job_mage.GetTitledFirstName] casted a spell to make [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] appreciate you more.
You cast a spell to make [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] appreciate you more.
Under your lieges orders you casted a spell to make [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] appreciate [From.GetHerHim] more.
Under your orders your court magician [Root.job_mage.GetTitledFirstName] casted a spell to heal [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].
Your cast a spell to heal [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].
Under your lieges orders you casted a spell to heal [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].
Under your orders your druid [Root.job_mage.GetTitledFirstName] with herbs and some magic healed [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].
You healed [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] with herbs and some magic.
Under your lieges orders you healed [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] with herbs and some magic.
